content: Create HTML element with id from config and insert it inside document body for place SDK frame:

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the action of creating an HTML element and inserting it into the document body. It appears in a UI component, likely a button or dialog prompt, that guides users through a step-by-step process for placing a Software Development Kit (SDK) frame.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "أنشئوا" (anshie'oo) implies a command directed towards a group or formal address. It's more appropriate to use a more general imperative like "أنشئ" (anshe') which means 'create' or 'establish'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أنشئ عنصر "HTML" باستخدام المعرّف من الإعدادات وأدرجوه في جسم المستند لوضع إطار "SDK"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The quotation marks around "SDK" in Arabic should be consistent with those used in English (double quotes).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أنشئوا عنصر "HTML" باستخدام المعرّف من الإعدادات وأدرجوه في جسم المستند لوضع إطار "SDK"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Konfiqurasiyadan id-dən istifadə edərək HTML elementi yaradın" is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "Konfiqurasiyadan id ilə HTML elementi yaradın" or "Konfiqurasiyada göstərilən id ilə HTML elementi yaradın".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfiqurasiyada göstərilən id ilə HTML elementi yaradın

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "SDK çərçivəsini yerləşdirmək üçün onu sənədin daxilinə əlavə edin" could be improved. "SDK çərçivəsini yerləşdirmək üçün onu sənədin bədəninə (body) əlavə edin" would be more accurate and specific.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDK çərçivəsini yerləşdirmək üçün onu sənədin bədəninə (body) əlavə edin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation doesn't clearly differentiate between the English and Azerbaijani, and lacks an english term (body) to clarify the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfiqurasiyada göstərilən id ilə HTML elementi yaradın və SDK çərçivəsini yerləşdirmək üçün onu sənədin bədəninə (body) əlavə edin:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "за място в SDK рамка" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the intended meaning of 'for place SDK frame.' A more natural translation would be something like 'за поставяне на SDK рамката' or 'за да се помести SDK рамката'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: за поставяне на SDK рамката

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Dokumenttext' is not the correct translation for 'document body'. It translates more to 'document text'. The intended meaning is the HTML body.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Erstellen Sie ein HTML-Element mit der ID aus der Konfiguration und fügen Sie es in den HTML-Body ein, um den SDK-Rahmen zu platzieren:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better readability in German. The command form ('Erstellen Sie...') can feel abrupt. A slightly more polite phrasing would be preferable, especially in documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Erstellen Sie ein HTML-Element mit der ID aus der Konfiguration und fügen Sie dieses in den HTML-Body ein, um den SDK-Rahmen zu platzieren:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'διαμόρφωση' (configuration) is technically correct, but in this context, 'ρυθμίσεις' (settings) might be a more natural and common choice for a technical document.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'διαμόρφωση' with 'ρυθμίσεις'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'για την τοποθέτηση πλαισίου SDK' is slightly awkward. A more fluent phrasing would suggest a more active role of the element.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'για την τοποθέτηση του πλαισίου SDK' or 'για να τοποθετηθεί το πλαίσιο SDK'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Spanish sentence structure is slightly awkward. The phrase 'a insértelo' is not the most natural way to express the insertion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cree un elemento HTML con id a partir de la configuración e insértelo dentro del cuerpo del documento para colocar el marco SDK:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "asiakirjan runkoon" (document body) is a literal translation that is awkward in Finnish. A more natural phrasing would be "dokumentin runkoon" or simply "runkoon". While technically correct, it sounds stilted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Luo HTML-elementti tunnuksella konfiguraatiosta ja liitä se dokumentin runkoon paikkaan, joka on SDK-kehystä varten:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "paikkaan, joka on SDK-kehystä varten" (place that is for the SDK frame) is a bit verbose and could be more concise. "SDK-kehyksen paikalle" or something similar would be more idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Luo HTML-elementti tunnuksella konfiguraatiosta ja liitä se dokumentin runkoon SDK-kehyksen paikalle:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Créez un élément HTML avec l'identifiant de la configuration et insérez-le dans le corps du document pour placer le cadre SDK :' is slightly awkward and could be improved for clarity.  'Identifiant de la configuration' is a bit technical and may not be the best choice.  'Cadre SDK' is also a literal translation and could be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Créez un élément HTML avec l'identifiant défini dans la configuration et insérez-le dans le corps du document pour y intégrer le SDK.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the sentence is unusual and a bit too formal for technical documentation. Consider removing it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon at the end of the sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a hyphen in 'config-ից' which isn't standard Armenian writing for this context. It should be 'կոնֆիգից'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ստեղծել HTML տարր՝ կոնֆիգից ստացված id-ով և տեղադրել այն document.body-ում՝ SDK շրջանակի համար՝

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'տեղադրել' (tegladrel) for 'insert' is technically correct, but 'միացնել' (miatsnel) or 'ներարկել' (nerarkel) could be more appropriate and natural sounding in this context when referring to inserting something into the body of a document.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ստեղծել HTML տարր՝ կոնֆիգից ստացված id-ով և միացնել այն document.body-ում՝ SDK շրջանակի համար՝

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'config' is an English loanword and should ideally be replaced with an Italian equivalent or adapted to fit the Italian grammar.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: configurazione

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'nel corpo del documento' is technically correct but sounds slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: nel corpo della pagina

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "place SDK frame" is a bit awkward. A more natural Japanese phrasing would be something like "SDKフレームを配置する" or "SDKフレームを設置する".  The current translation suggests simply "配置する", which is technically correct but lacks nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDKフレームを設置する

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon (:) at the end of the Japanese sentence feels abrupt. Japanese often uses more fluid sentence endings. It's not strictly incorrect, but it makes the translation sound less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDKフレームを設置します。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "SDK 프레임을 배치하기 위해" is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "SDK 프레임을 넣기 위해" or "SDK 프레임을 포함하기 위해". The original English implies placement, but the current translation leans towards a purpose/reason.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDK 프레임을 넣기 위해

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not incorrect, the colon at the end of the sentence makes it sound like a command or instruction rather than a description. Removing it might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDK 프레임을 넣기 위해 문서 본문에 삽입하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ອງກ໌ການ' is likely a typo and should be 'ອົງການ' (organization) or a more appropriate term depending on the context. However, given the context, 'ອງກ໌ການ' doesn't seem appropriate. Consider replacing with 'ເອະລິເມັນ' (element) or a more contextually correct term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເອະລິເມັນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'ສ້າງ ... ແລະ ໃສ່ມັນເຂົ້າໄປໃນຕົວເນື້ອຂອງເອກະສານ' is a bit clunky. It could be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສ້າງເອະລິເມັນ HTML ທີ່ມີ id ຈາກ config ແລະ ໃສ່ມັນເຂົ້າໄປໃນຕົວເນື້ອຂອງເອກະສານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There's a space before 'ວາງ' which is unnecessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ວາງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'place SDK frame' is a bit vague. While 'ວາງ' means 'place', it doesn't fully capture the intended meaning. A more precise term might be beneficial depending on what 'placing' refers to.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ເຟມ SDK

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'izveidojiet HTML elementu' is grammatically correct but slightly formal. A more natural phrasing might be 'izveidot HTML elementu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: izveidot HTML elementu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: A colon is used at the end of the Latvian sentence. While not strictly incorrect, it's less common in technical documentation in Latvian. Removing it improves consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izveidojiet HTML elementu ar ID no konfigurācijas un ievietojiet to dokumenta saturā, lai izvietotu SDK rāmi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "voeg het in de documenttekst in" is not the best way to express "insert it inside document body." It's a bit clunky. A more natural translation would be something like "plaats het in" or "voeg het toe aan".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maak HTML-element aan met id van config en plaats het in de documenttekst om het SDK-kader te plaatsen:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'place SDK frame' is not accurately translated. 'Colocar a moldura do SDK' implies placing a frame *of* the SDK, rather than the SDK itself being placed. A more accurate translation would convey the action of embedding or integrating the SDK.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Incorpore o SDK

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the sentence breaks the flow. It isn't standard Portuguese punctuation in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon at the end of the sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Creați elementul HTML cu id-ul din configurarea și introduceți-l în corpul documentului pentru a plasa cadrul SDK:" is not the most natural Romanian. "Configurarea" is technically correct, but "configurație" would be more common and idiomatic in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Creați elementul HTML cu id-ul din configurație și introduceți-l în corpul documentului pentru a plasa cadrul SDK:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the sentence feels abrupt. It would be more natural to rephrase the sentence to avoid it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Creați elementul HTML cu id-ul din configurație și introduceți-l în corpul documentului pentru a plasa cadrul SDK.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ඉදිරිපත් කරන ලද වින්‍යාසයෙන්' (idiripathakaran lada vinayasayan) translates to 'from the presented configuration,' which isn't the most natural phrasing. A more direct translation of 'from config' might be 'වින්‍යාසයෙන්' (vinayasayan) or 'වින්‍යාසයට අනුව' (vinayasaya anuva).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඉදිරිපත් කරන ලද වින්‍යාසයෙන් -> වින්‍යාසයෙන් or වින්‍යාසයට අනුව

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ලේඛනයේ ශරීරය තුළට ඇතුළු කරන්න:' (lekanathiyama shareeraya thulatha ennava:) literally translates to 'insert into the body of the document'. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more fluent phrasing for 'insert it inside document body' could be 'ලේඛනයේදි එය තැබන්න:' (lekanedi eya thabanna:) or 'ලේඛනයේ ශරීරයට යහපත්ව තැබන්න:' (lekanathiyama shareeraya yahaapathwa thabanna:)
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ලේඛනයේ ශරීරය තුළට ඇතුළු කරන්න: -> ලේඛනයේදි එය තැබන්න: or ලේඛනයේ ශරීරයට යහපත්ව තැබන්න:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'konfiguračného' should be 'konfigurácie'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vytvorte prvok HTML s id získaným z konfigurácie a vložte ho do tela dokumentu ako miesto pre SDK rámec.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Ustvarite element HTML z ID-jem iz konfiguracije in ga vstavite v telo dokumenta za okvir SDK:" is not entirely accurate. The phrase 'za okvir SDK:' implies purpose ('for the SDK frame') rather than a direct action. A more accurate translation would indicate the placement of the frame.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustvarite element HTML z ID-jem iz konfiguracije in ga vstavite v telo dokumenta za umestitev okvira SDK:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the Slovenian translation feels slightly awkward. It's not a common practice in this type of sentence structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon at the end of the sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'okvir' is used instead of 'рам'. While 'okvir' is a valid Serbian word, 'рам' is a more accurate translation of 'frame' in the context of a software development kit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Замијените 'оквир' са 'рам'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ID-jem' is a slightly awkward phrasing. While technically correct, it's not the most natural way to express 'ID' in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID-a

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'kako bi se postavio SDK okvir' is a bit verbose and can be simplified. It uses a reflexive verb construction ('se postavio') which isn't strictly necessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: da se postavi SDK okvir

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'place SDK frame' is not accurately reflected in the Turkish translation. 'Yerleştirmek' implies a general placement, while the English suggests a specific positioning within the body.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDK çerçevesini doğru konumlandırmak için

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the sentence is unnecessary in Turkish and looks awkward. Turkish sentences generally do not end with colons in this manner.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDK çerçevesini doğru konumlandırmak için

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "để đặt khung SDK" could be improved for clarity and flow. It directly translates to "to place SDK frame," which isn't the most natural phrasing in Vietnamese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "để chứa khung SDK" (to contain the SDK frame) or "để hiển thị khung SDK" (to display the SDK frame).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "从配置中创建具有 id 的 HTML 元素" can be improved for clarity and flow. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 使用配置信息创建具有 ID 的 HTML 元素

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the sentence isn't grammatically correct in Chinese.  It's more common to end sentences with a full stop or nothing at all.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon and replace it with a full stop (。).
